pages.text: The $(b)Heart of Ascension$() is the pinnacle of your sanguine journey. Infused with the power of lightning, it pushes your body to divine limits.

Eating $(6)10 of these celestial hearts$() will grant you the final $(4)10 health increments$(). A true master of the Blood Arsenal can reach a total of $(n)30 additional hearts$() by mastering all three types.
